data.title: Ecosystem Partners
data.meta_description: The extensive network of ecosystem partners at Zyxel Networks includes two types of partners: Alliance Partners and Nebula Technology Application Partners.
data.text:
ASPEED is an innovator of cutting-edge SoC system solutions focusing on niche-market, which include Server Management SoC solution, PC/AV extension solution, and Cupola360 multi-image stitching SoC. With the increasing demands of public information display and PC remote control, ASPEED’s PC/AV Extension solutions are designed to address the market demands. Our core technologies include “AV over IP” and “USB over IP”, which support IP-controlled PC Extension for application scenarios such as matrix KVM switch extender and matrix PC centralization. Our AV extension solution can support not only 1-to-1 AV extenders, but also IP-controlled multi-input to multi-output AV extension with ultra-high resolution 4K2K contents. It can support UHD resolution extension over IP with visually lossless image quality and low latency by utilizing Ethernet technology and ASPEED’s patented image compression algorithm.

MobiMESH inPiazza is a complete platform for WiFi Engagement and Analytics. inPiazza delivers a top level WiFi experience for Guests and Staff users, with lots of authentication met hods and several third party/CRM/IDP native integrations, advanced return management features and much more.

Every part of the Customer Journey can be easily managed, from the pre-login advertising campaigns to the multi-tier funnel to CRM onboarding, to the post login coupon delivery and Social Marketing.

inPiazza also incorporates ReConnect tools, to send messages and push notification upon actions in the physical venue, detected via WiFi activity. inPiazza can be provided as White Label platform for ISPs who want to provide a full stack network service.

Paessler is a professional network monitoring solution provider. Zyxel recommends its product “PRTG” as a network monitoring tool for a Zyxel network. PRTG supports SNMP, WMI and Flow monitoring, as well as Packet Sniffing, and monitoring of IPv6 devices. It provides a comprehensive graphic interface, and alarm & notification support.

Paessler AG leads the industry in providing the most powerful, affordable and easy-to-use network monitoring and testing solutions. The company’s suite of just-right software products deliver peace of mind, confidence and convenience for businesses of all sizes – from Small Office/Home Office (SOHO) to large enterprises, including more than 70% of the Fortune 100 companies. Based in Nuremberg, Germany, Paessler’s global reach includes more than 150,000 active installations of its products. Paessler was founded in 1997.

Spotty is the Marketing and Reputation Suite which will revolutionize the way you communicate with the customer. In just one tool you can manage a database of profiled contacts, monitor customer satisfaction and online reputation, and plan targeted and effective marketing campaigns via e-mail, SMS or geolocated push notifications via the application.

A powerful marketing tool that will soon become a must-have for your business!

By the mature technology of computer, such as Zyxel nebula cloud networking, Sunshine Energy Technology uses I.o.T. system to upload data to the cloud by seconds, make S.O.P practically and keep the environment safety. And Food Records, the videographic food traceability system records all processes by photos, videos, sound and GPS. We hope to build the reliable relation between farmers, wholesalers, restaurants and consumers.

Sunshine Energy Technology hope to provide complete solution to the food industry and let Taiwan earns the world-wide reputation of Gourmet Kingdom.

WiFlex is a cloudbased multi-tenant solution to onboard your guests and employees easily and secure on the WiFi. We use unique psk's (wpa2) keys for security. So no radius needed.

BYOD solution: Your users can login with Azure / Office365 / Gsuite and automatically receive a unique and secure WiFi password based on their security group. You can also assign different VLANs based on the security group.

Visitor registration: Visitors register on a tablet, receive a visitor badge and a unique WiFi password. Your employees receive a SMS/mail when his visitor is check-in. You have an overview of your current visitors.

One Click: With one click on a button on a tablet we create a unique WiFi password

Working on solution for room area networks (Hotels, student rooms, healthcare,...)
